synopsis.text: Across a barren, sun-scorched expanse, an ensemble of charming, mythical creatures stir from their slumber. Adorned with wings and horns, these majestic beings exchange pleasantries as their paths intertwine. Originally aired on NHK's 'Stage 101,' this delightful segment also graced the screens during the beloved 'Minna no Uta' portion, inviting viewers into their enchanting world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
